comments.comments_text: Pablo Piatti (Espanyol) takes the corner but it's cleared. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Espanyol.

comments.comments_text: Pablo Piatti (Espanyol) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Brais Mendez (Celta Vigo) was quite harsh and Santiago Jaime Latre didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Pablo Piatti (Espanyol) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Mario Hermoso (Espanyol) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball into the right side of the goal. It's 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball into the right side of the goal. It's 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Leo Baptistao (Espanyol) produces a lovely ball into the penalty area but the defender manages to intercept and comfortably averts the danger. Espanyol have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Pablo Piatti (Espanyol). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

comments.comments_text: It's an own goal! A pitiful moment for David Lopez (Espanyol), who tries to clear a cross into the six-yard box but instead sends the ball behind his own keeper. The score is 1:1.
